summary: This document details an investigation involving attorney Bradley James Edwards and Alfredo Rodriguez, who was an employee of Jeffrey Epstein. Edwards is representing four women suing Epstein and has deposed Rodriguez, who is attempting to sell documents related to the case despite being under subpoena to provide them.

persons.name: Bradley James Edwards
persons.context: Edwards is representing four female individuals suing Jeffrey Epstein and has deposed Alfredo Rodriguez.

persons.name: Alfredo Rodriguez
persons.context: Rodriguez was an employee for Epstein and is trying to sell documents related to the case to Edwards.

connections.description: Edwards is deposing Rodriguez in relation to the civil case against Epstein.

events.title: Contact Between Edwards and Rodriguez
events.description: Bradley James Edwards contacted Alfredo Rodriguez regarding documents pertinent to the civil case against Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Subpoena and Document Demand
events.description: Rodriguez was served with a federal subpoena to provide documents but attempted to sell them to Edwards instead.

keyFacts: Bradley James Edwards is representing four women suing Jeffrey Epstein.
Alfredo Rodriguez was an employee of Epstein and is attempting to sell documents related to the case.
Rodriguez is under subpoena to provide documents but is demanding $50,000 for them.
Edwards plans to make a consensual call to Rodriguez to facilitate the transaction with an undercover employee.
